*QoAD:g{.CP^8t{!fYD%.text: WHAT NEEDS TO BE DONE TO FINISH CURRENT LEVELS:- Flip Switch: Add enemies (koopa paratroopas?), more ? blocks and bricks, and coins.- Fantastic Falls: Add more ? blocks / bricks, add coins, and add Madame Brood as a miniboss.- Cloud Ship: Add ? blocks, bricks, coins, and Bowser Jr. as a boss.

x]A{Y9P?Zzthmhq%1PWw.text: NEW LEVELS:How to use:Music should be chosen when the scralaxy is made unless otherwise specified.Minibosses and bosses can be found by searching for them on Google, they are all Mario characters.Please try to follow the level design, ask me (@redyoshi857) if you have any questions.Grand Tree ScralaxyMusic: Gusty Garden GalaxyMiniboss: Mega WigglerLevel Design: Ordinary jungle level centered around a giant tree.Lazy Lagoon ScralaxyMusic: Beach Bowl GalaxyMiniboss: Cheep ChompLevel Design: Water level with an island.Tiki Treehouse ScralaxyMiniboss: Donkey KongLevel Design: A tiki village, and then a treehouse with a Donkey Kong-style level similar to the New Donk City Festival.Spooky Space ScralaxyLevel Design: A ghost house.Shipwreck ScralaxyBoss: TriclydeLevel Design: A shipwreck boss scralaxy.Searing Sand ScralaxyMusic: NSMBU Desert ThemeMiniboss: FryguyLevel Design: The original World 2 from 0.4.7.Pyramid Puzzle ScralaxyLevel Design: A pyramid focused on manipulating enemies and items to progress in some way. Would this be possible??Sweet Sweet ScralaxyMusic: Sweet Sweet Kingdom (MK8D)Miniboss: BirdoLevel Design: A mix of Sweet Sweet Kingdom and Sweet Sweet Galaxy. Maybe a little Luncheon Kingdom mixed in?Mesa Mine ScralaxyLevel Design: A gold mine underneath a mesa. Featuring a more advanced version of the Deep Delve Scralaxy minecart track.Fire Castle ScralaxyMusic: Some Mario castle music, choice of whoever makes the scralaxy.Boss: BowserLevel Design: A fiery castle. 'Nuff said.Shiver Cliff ScralaxyMiniboss: Chief ChillyLevel Design: An ordinary snow level.Ski Glacier ScralaxyMiniboss: Baron BrrrLevel Design: A ski resort and ski slopes.Sky Frost ScralaxyLevel Design: Pretty much more difficult Flip Switch Scralaxy and it's frozen.Ice Slide ScralaxyMusic: Slider from SM64Level Design: An icy level based on sliding and racing a penguin.Snow Hideout ScralaxyBoss: Snifberg the UnfeelingLevel Design: An igloo.Raging Flame ScralaxyMiniboss: WartLevel Design: Ordinary lava level.Shiverburn ScralaxyLevel Design: A level that has both lava and ice in it.Fire Factory ScralaxyMiniboss: TatangaLevel Design: A factory. Also kind of orange and filled with fire.Moon Base ScralaxyMusic: Moon KingdomLevel Design: A moon base, of course.Summit ScralaxyMusic: Silence before the boss rush, then boss music, then silence after that.Bosses: Dry Bowser, King Boo, BoolossusLevel Design: A boss rush on the volcano summit which reaches up to space. Starts with Dry Bowser who is angry at Mario for killing him, then King Boo appears and reveals he was the pilot of the UFO and the unknown force Wart and Tatanga were working with. Once he is defeated, he uses the last Grand Star to transform into Boolossus. After he is defeated, the power star is collected and the ending happens.Intrusive Internet GalaxyMusic: Windows XP Installation MusicMiniboss: A vIrUs!Level Design: Lots of iconic Window XP windows, which you have to platform over.
